item.description:
Join us for a delightful evening of glamor, fashion and fun at elegant Center Court inside Copley Place. Guests will enjoy a fashion show hosted by NECN reporter/anchor Jackie Bruno and featuring Smiling Stiletto Shoe Club members modeling fashions by Copley Place retailers including:

  • Bebe
  • Banana Republic
  • Cache
  • American Eagle
  • Soft Surroundings

While mingling with other shoe and fashion lovers, guests will enjoy complimentary Voli Vodka cocktails, GuS soda and appetizers and desserts from:

  • Rita's Catering
  • Finale Desserts
  • The Good Life Kitchen
  • Wichit Sandwiches
  • Pretzel Crisps
  • Confectionary Creations
  • LaCascia's Bakery

Be sure to wear your most glamorous spring shoes for an opportunity to strut down the catwalk and win some fabulous prizes during the Best-in-Shoe competition.

Â 

Tickets are $20. All proceeds benefit Project Smile and the Simon Youth Foundation. Project Smile is a non profit organization dedicated to helping children who are victims of traumatic events.

All guests will receive a special gift bag. Event is 21+ with proper ID. Smiling Stiletto is a free social organization for shoe and fashion lovers with 2,700 members in the Boston area. This is the exclusive Smiling Stiletto fashion show at Copley Place this year, so be sure to get your tickets soon as this event will sell out! Guys- be sure to join us for a fun night with lots of lovely ladies in attendance!

Tix must be purchased in advance at:


http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e70jz6he6b4fa576&llr=lzytkqcab
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine inside the event area near the pink carpet. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: Step into Spring Fashion Show and Cocktail Party
